ISSUE.TITLE: Server get stuck at startup with docker compose
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio/blob/edb7484a02d3715e75dd970522f49aa4d8dea2c6/docker-compose.yml#L37 It seems that server is not starting up with this entry. It gets stuck after checking db health. ``` app_1 | Postgres is up - executing command ``` Solution was to replace with: ``` command: [ "./deploy/wait-for-postgres.sh", "label-studio" ] ```
